backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling access control, user profiles, video uploads, premium subscriptions, and blob storage via mixins.
backend/migration_types.mo: Defines old/new actor state types for migrations, adding optional customization settings to existing stored data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping video-related frontend changes to features, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing routing, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, theming rules, and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file injecting the React app entrypoint via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with app branding, navigation buttons, and authentication-dependent profile or login controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout including header, routed content, profile setup dialog, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Authorization utility and component prompting sign-in before protected actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication state and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post card with author info, media preview, tags, and actions including like, repost, share, and download.
frontend/src/components/PostVideo.tsx: Loads and displays a video by ID with loading and error states using useVideoFile.
frontend/src/components/ProfileMenu.tsx: Provides a dropdown menu for the current user with profile info, premium/admin links, and logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to set up a username and full name.
frontend/src/components/VideoUploadField: Handles video file selection with validation, preview, and removal for uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks for checking admin status and performing admin login/logout with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and exposes the caller's user profile and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomizationSetti: Retrieves and saves user customization settings through backend actor calls with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePremiumSubscriptio: Implements hooks to query premium status and perform premium upgrade or cancellation via actor methods with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains various mutation hooks for saving profiles, liking/reposting templates, uploading videos, and publishing inâ€‘memory template posts.
frontend/src/hooks/useTemplatePosts.ts: Provides a query hook to fetch combined mock and newly created template posts, plus a helper to add new posts to memory.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoFile.ts: Fetches a video file by ID from the backend actor using a React Query hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom CSS variables for themes, and utility classes including glass effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders an admin interface handling II login, admin authentication, and customization settings management.
frontend/src/pages/ComposePage.tsx: Implements a form for creating new template posts, including optional video upload and publishing logic.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Renders the main feed with trending/latest tabs, optimistic like/repost updates, and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post with mock data, video or image preview, and like/repost/share/download actions.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumPage.tsx: Shows premium subscription status, features, and upgrade/cancel actions with authentication checks.
frontend/src/types/post.ts: Defines the TemplatePost interface describing post metadata, media, and engagement fields.
frontend/src/utils/directDownload.ts: Attempts to open a template link; if blocked, copies it to the clipboard with toast notifications.
frontend/src/utils/shareToAlightMotion.t: Opens a deep link for Alight Motion or falls back to copying it to the clipboard with feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query modes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: JSON describing project metadata, existing features, and design/auth notes for an Alight Motion template sharing app. It tracks schema version, project state, feature list, and UI/architecture guidance.
